text: @NYGovCuomo Hi Mr Cuomo, have been a supporter of your Dad &  Family, I wish you would show a little love to NYCFC. Team mad a big donation to help Covid19. Is a finalist for community work award ( includes every major sports team from ESPN. Team fans feel disrespected. NY Strong. GOD Bless
